name: Shiva
description:
Shiva, also known as Mahadeva is one of the principal deities of Hinduism. Lord Shiva is said to be the deity of death and time. In the Sanskrit language, kālá means time. He is the Supreme Being in Shaivism, one of the major traditions within Hinduism.

Shiva is known as "The Destroyer" within the Trimurti, the triple deity of supreme divinity that includes Brahma and Vishnu. In the Shaivite tradition, Shiva is the Supreme Lord who creates, protects and transforms the universe.
